city.description: Belmopan is the capital of Belize
city.history: Belmopan was established following the devastation of the former capital, Belize City, by Hurricane Hattie in 1965. High ground and open space influenced the choice and ground-breaking began in 1966. By 1970 most government offices and operations had already moved to the new location.

city.description: Kuala Lumpur is the capital of Malaysia and the largest city in the nation
city.history: The city was founded in 1857 by Chinese tin miners and preceded Klang. In 1880 the British government transferred their headquarters from Klang to Kuala Lumpur, and in 1896 it became the capital of Malaysia.

city.description: Winnipeg has two seasons. Winter and Construction.
city.history: The city was founded by people at the forks (Fort Garry) trading in pelts with the Hudson Bay Company. Ironically, The Bay was bought by America.
